attributes.additional_details:
The investigation has collapsed due to 'lack of evidence' despite credible witness testimony and no valid reason has been given for the results concerning more then 40 care homes having been made top secret

The investigation has actually raised more questions then it answered and further highlighted the power of the elite. Parents who lost their children and adults who's childhood's were destroyed have been left with answers or justice.
attributes.background: Today it was announced that no charges will be brought in the investigation into alleged sexual abuse and murder of young boys linked to high profile Westminster suspects.

rejection.details: This is a decision for the police, not the Government or Parliament.
